oai_dc:dc.dc:title: John Long
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Edwin Best
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Greenback (Tenn.);
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Peddler John Long bartering store good for country produce. Three people standing next to wagon hitched to two horses. Wagon has a cover and is in front of an outbuilding. One man has a white beard and is holding a cane. The woman, her hair pulled back, holds a basket.
